import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Restore deleted ticket"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/{ticketId}/undelete"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Restores a soft-deleted ticket by setting its `IsDeleted` flag to false. The ticket will appear in normal search results again after restoration.

**Prerequisites**
1. **ticketId** – Use [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) with `OnlyShowDeleted: true` filter to find deleted tickets and extract `Items[].TicketId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Search deleted tickets: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) with `OnlyShowDeleted: true` → extract `Items[].TicketId`
2. Restore ticket: [PUT /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/undelete](/docs/api/tickets/undelete-ticket)

**Note**: This operation requires appropriate permissions. The caller must have rights to restore tickets in the target site.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"ticketId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the ticket to restore. Obtain via POST /api/v1.0/tickets with OnlyShowDeleted filter.","example":"0466a7fd-6dab-ef11-88cf-6045bdb6b1c8","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchTickets","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/tickets","responseField":"Items[].TicketId"},"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Ticket restored successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response returned when a ticket is successfully restored (undeleted).","properties":{"Uid":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID of the restored ticket","example":"0466a7fd-6dab-ef11-88cf-6045bdb6b1c8"},"IsSuccess":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates whether the operation succeeded","example":true},"Message":{"type":"string","description":"Optional message about the operation","nullable":true},"UserToken":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Echo of the authenticated user token"},"RequestDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Timestamp when the request was processed"},"StatusCode":{"type":"integer","description":"HTTP status code mirrored in the response body","example":200}},"required":["Uid","IsSuccess","StatusCode"],"title":"TicketUndeleteResponse"},"example":{"Uid":"0466a7fd-6dab-ef11-88cf-6045bdb6b1c8","IsSuccess":true,"Message":"Ticket restored successfully","UserToken":"c64a05b1-6a2d-ea11-a601-0003ffe41fe2","RequestDate":"2025-01-15T10:30:00Z","StatusCode":200}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized – caller is not authenticated"},"403":{"description":"Forbidden – caller lacks permission to restore tickets"},"404":{"description":"Not found – ticket does not exist or is not deleted"}}}
